original_text: And the border went up to Bethhogla, and passed along by the north of Betharabah; and the border went up to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben:
korean_text: 벧 호글라로 올라가서 벧 아라바 북쪽을 지나 르우벤 자손 보한의 돌에 이르고

sentences.original_text: And the border went up to Bethhogla
and passed along by the north of Betharabah
and the border went up to the stone of Bohan
